H0.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Promethium

H1.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Barium

H2.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Radium

H3.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Kryptonite

A4.text: The planet was named after the chemical element krypton.

A5.text: When Krypton was destroyed, fragments from the planet were launched into space, resulting in the creation of a harmful radioactive substance known as kryptonite.

A6.text: Kryptonite was officially introduced in the radio serial The Adventures of Superman, in the story 'The Meteor from Krypton', broadcast in June 1943.

A7.text: Kryptonite is a mineral from the planet Krypton that drains Superman of his strength and gives superhuman powers to humans.
